@@ -38,0 +39,33 @@
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+                <version>1.8</version>
+                <executions>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>createDirAndMacCompileFlags</id>
+                        <phase>initialize</phase>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>run</goal>
+                        </goals> 
+                        <configuration>
+                            <target>
+                                <mkdir dir="${hat.stage.jextract}"/>
+                                <echo file="${hat.stage.jextract}/compile_flags.txt" message="-F${mac.app.frameworks}"/>
+                            </target>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>copyJarToBuild</id>
+                        <phase>install</phase>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>run</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <target>
+                                <jar basedir="${hat.stage.jextract}" destfile="${hat.build}/${project.artifactId}-${project.version}.jar" includes="opencl/**"/>
+                            </target>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                </executions>
+            </plugin>
+

+                        <id>runJextractOnOpenCL</id>

+    <!--Auto generated by mkpoms-->
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+    <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+    <artifactId>hat-clwrap</artifactId>
+    <version>1.0</version>
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+        <artifactId>hat-wrap-root</artifactId>
+        <version>1.0</version>
+    </parent>
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+            <artifactId>hat-wrap</artifactId>
+            <version>1.0</version>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+            <artifactId>hat-core</artifactId>
+            <version>1.0</version>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+            <artifactId>hat-backend-ffi-opencl</artifactId>
+            <version>1.0</version>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+            <artifactId>hat-jextracted-opencl</artifactId>
+            <version>1.0</version>
+        </dependency>
+    </dependencies>
+    <build> 
+      <plugins>
+        <plugin>
+           <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+           <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+           <version>1.8</version>
+           <executions>
+              <execution>
+                <id>1</id>
+                <phase>install</phase>
+                <goals>
+                   <goal>run</goal>
+                </goals>
+                <configuration>
+                   <target>
+                      <copy file="target/${project.artifactId}-${project.version}.jar" toDir="${hat.build}"/>
+                   </target>
+                </configuration>
+              </execution>
+          </executions>
+        </plugin>
+      </plugins>
+    </build>
+</project>

+    <version>1.0</version>
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+        <artifactId>hat-wrap-root</artifactId>
+        <version>1.0</version>
+    </parent>
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+            <artifactId>hat-wrap</artifactId>
+            <version>1.0</version>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+            <artifactId>hat-core</artifactId>
+            <version>1.0</version>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>oracle.code</groupId>
+            <artifactId>hat-jextracted-opengl</artifactId>
+            <version>1.0</version>
+        </dependency>
+    </dependencies>
+<build> 
+      <plugins>
+        <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+                <version>1.8</version>
+                <executions>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>1</id>
+                        <phase>install</phase>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>run</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <target>
+                                <copy file="target/${project.artifactId}-${project.version}.jar" toDir="${hat.build}"/>
+                            </target>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                </executions>
+            </plugin>
+      </plugins>
+    </build>
+
+</project>
